content:
As an AI language model, the duration of the guided tour varies depending on the company or guide you choose, usually taking between 1 to 2 hours. Visitors should check with the tour operator for more details on tour duration.

Regarding safety protocols or restrictions, visitors should consider a few things before visiting the fortress. First, they should adhere to the designated paths marked, and visitors shouldn't climb or enter the fortress's ruins or off-limit areas.  Visitors should wear proper footwear, consider the weather condition, and bring a hat or sunscreen as some parts are exposed to the sun. For children, visitors should ensure that they keep an eye on them and not climb the walls alone. Visitors with limited mobility might face difficulties at some specific locations, so be sure to mention this to the tour operator in advance. In general, visitors should respect the fortress's cultural heritage, surroundings, and follow all safety instructions provided by the tour operator or the guide.
